players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I find it odd that we've already had a death in the game so early on. Let's stay vigilant and make sure we don't let any mafia members slip through."
You: "I agree with Diana. Let's all work together to ensure the safety of our town and eliminate any mafia members if we suspect any."

Charlie: "I believe we should keep an open mind and consider all possibilities in this game. Let's not jump to conclusions based on one death, as it could be a coincidence. We should focus on building trust and working together as a team."
Diana: "I'd like to propose that we all share our alibis for last night. This will help build trust and transparency within the group, and give us a better understanding of each other's movements."

You: "I agree with Charlie's suggestion to keep an open mind in this game. Let's focus on building trust and working together as a team, rather than jumping to conclusions based on one death. As for my alibi last night, I was in my room..."

Charlie: "I'd like to propose that we all share our alibis for last night, as Diana suggested. This will help build trust and transparency within the group, giving us a better understanding of each other's movements."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested
